for some reason the background music is WAY too loud and i cant even hear the dialogue most of the time...this is just in the sample but i've experienced this before while watching a different movie.

People, believe me AAC soundtrack in this movie is converted to be almost transparent to DTS HD core track, but AAC is NEW codec and sometimes causes problems due to misconfiguration of your device player. There are problemms in default settings of MPC HC as well so you need to check PLAYER folder. This fixes basic issues, but if you want to hear full quality you need to change other settings as well - OUTPUT BITDEPTH to 24bits, VOLUME REGAIN etc.
